org.libav.util.swing

Class VideoPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • org.libav.util.swing.VideoPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, IFrameConsumer

    public class VideoPane
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements IFrameConsumer
    SWING component for video rendering.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • processFrame

        public void processFrame(java.lang.Object producer,
                IFrameWrapper frame)
        Description copied from interface: IFrameConsumer
        This method will be called by a frame decoder. It delivers audio/video frames.
        Specified by:
        processFrame in interface IFrameConsumer
        Parameters:
        producer - a video frame producer responsible for calling this method and producing the video frame
        frame - a video frame
